snippet: HBO confirmed on Thursday that it has stopped selling DVDs to Netflix at a discount.
abstract: HBO confirmed on Thursday that it has stopped selling DVDs to Netflix at a discount.
lead_paragraph: Netflix said a month ago that it sees HBO as its chief rival. And it appears that HBO agrees, as the company confirmed on Thursday that it had decided to stop selling DVDs to Netflix at a discount.

headline.main: HBO Ends DVD Discounts for Netflix
